ARABIC: قُلْ يُحْيِيهَا ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَهَآ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ خَلْقٍ عَلِيمٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Say 'He who made them in the first place will bring them back to life. He has total knowledge of each created thing;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Say: "He who created you the first time. He has knowledge of every creation,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Say: “He Who first brought them into being will quicken them; He knows well about every kind of creation;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), tell him, "He who gave them life in the first place will bring them back to life again. He has the best knowledge of all creatures.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Proclaim (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “They will be revived by the One Who created them the first time; and He is the All Knowing of every creation.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Say: "He will give life to them Who created them for the first time! And He is the All-Knower of every creation!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Say: He will give life to them Who brought them into existence at first, and He is cognizant of all creation
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Say: 'He shall quicken them, who originated them the first time; He knows all creation,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Say: He will revive them Who produced them at the first, for He is Knower of every creation,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Say, "He who brought them into being in the first instance will give them life again: He has knowledge of every type of creation:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Say thou:" He shall quicken them Who brought them forth for the first time, and He is of every kind of creation the Knower!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Say, ‘He will revive them who produced them the first time, and He has knowledge of all creation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Say, "He will give them life Who created them for the first time! for He is Well-versed in every kind of creation!-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Say: (O Muhammad SAW) "He will give life to them Who created them for the first time! And He is the All-Knower of every creation!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Say: 'He will quicken them who originated them the first time; He has knowledge of every creation;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Say, “He who initiated them in the first instance will revive them. He has knowledge of every creation.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Say, "He will give them life who produced them the first time; and He is, of all creation, Knowing."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [36:79] Say: ‘He will revive them Who originated them the first time, and He is Knower of all creation, [of every single] creature, generally and in detail, before and after it has been created —
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Say) to him, Muhammad: (He will revive them Who produced them) Who created them (at the first) from a sperm drop, (for He is Knower of every creation) He is Knower of the creation of everything,
